body:
Heey Avicus members! So, If you have seen my prior GoodBye post, Then You´ll know more or less what i am talking about.

So, I wan´t to talk about a Really special person, And that is SnowSX3. If you don´t know him, His a Avicus network Player, Moderator and Referee.So, From this particular introduction He´ll look like a Normal Moderator, Well, He really is, But, Snow has something special. He has the capacity of helping out in everything you need help in. He gets on well with all players and he´s a mature guy, But can be funny from time to time. Now, Snow isn´t anyone different to other players, But he has the capacity of been As kind as possible. (Please do not Spam him with problems)

Now, For the upcoming players of Avicus, You can really trust Snow as a person to talk about Personal Things, Since he is quite experienced and Mature enough to give a reasonable answer to your questions.

He´s not the Only one, But this post is just about him.

Dunno how to describe Snow, If I would need to describe Snow in a word, It would be Kind. This is not to Disrespect other players, But, In my opinion, And Again, This is just my opinion, Snow is probably one of the best persons i have known.

So, SnowSX3, Thanks a Freaking ton.
I´ll end up this post By posting an Example of What I meant before.

Situation: I couldn´t sleep since I have insomnia
Where: Skype
Time: 3 on the morning
